subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: From the World Cup to Wimbledon to the N.B.A. hoops and baseball's diamonds, there was more to the sporting year than simply winning and losing.
snippet: From the World Cup to Wimbledon to the N.B.A. hoops and baseball's diamonds, there was more to the sporting year than simply winning and losing.
